pricing.description: Choose the plan that best fits your needs and start your creative journey.

footer.description: Empower your presentation creation with AI. Input your ideas and generate beautiful slides effortlessly.

aiGenerator.title: AI Infographic Assistant
aiGenerator.description: Describe what you want to do with the infographic, AI can help you create, edit or delete infographics
aiGenerator.placeholder: Describe what you want to do with the infographic...
aiGenerator.errorPlaceholder: An error occurred, you can resend the message...
aiGenerator.requestFailed: Request failed, please try again later
aiGenerator.generationFailed: Generation failed, please try again later

hero.transformData: Transform raw data into stunning visual art instantly. AI-powered infographic engine that gives you precise control over every pixel.
hero.featuresDesc: Fast, real-time, beautiful, and intelligent—everything you need to create stunning infographics.
hero.lightningFastDesc: Generate professional infographics in seconds. From data to visual, instantly.
hero.realtimeEditingDesc: See changes instantly. Drag, resize, edit—zero delay, seamless workflow.
hero.beautifulDesignDesc: Auto-optimized colors, typography, and layouts. Publication-ready quality.
hero.aiPoweredDesc: Smart suggestions for charts, layouts, and styles. Describe your vision in plain English.
hero.powerfulSlideEditorDetail: A feature-rich editor designed for creating professional presentations. Combine AI-powered content generation with intuitive editing tools to bring your ideas to life.
hero.aiPoweredContentDesc: Generate slide content, outlines, and layouts automatically with AI assistance.
hero.richEditingToolsDesc: Customize text, images, and layouts with an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.
hero.exportAnywhereDesc: Export your presentations to PPT, PDF, or share them directly with a link.
hero.lovedByCreatorsDesc: Join thousands of designers streamlining their workflow.
hero.readyToVisualizeDesc: Join over 1000+ users creating professional infographics in minutes, not hours.

testimonial1.quote: This tool saved me hours on my last quarterly presentation. The AI understands context surrounding each.
testimonial1.name: Sarah Jenkins
testimonial1.title: Product Designer at Stripe

testimonial2.quote: Finally, a design tool that actually helps me visualize complex data without needing a PhD in statistics.
testimonial2.name: Mike T.
testimonial2.title: Data Analyst at Google

testimonial3.quote: The drag and drop interface combined with AI suggestions makes this the fastest tool at my arsenal.
testimonial3.name: Elena Rodriguez
testimonial3.title: Marketing Dir.
